verses.verse: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֜י <S%H8664><s%> the Tishbite מִתֹּשָׁבֵ֣י <S%H8453><s%> [who was] of the inhabitants גִלְעָד֮ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָב֒ <S%H256><s%> unto Ahab חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָמַ֣דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> whom I stand לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before אִם־ <S%H518><s%> surely יִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַשָּׁנִ֥ים <S%H8141><s%> these years הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these טַ֣ל <S%H2919><s%> there shall not be dew וּמָטָ֑ר <S%H4306><s%> nor rain כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> there אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall be neither לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> but according דְבָרִֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> to my word ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto him saying

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> here וּפָנִ֥יתָ <S%H6437><s%> thee hence and turn לְּךָ֖ קֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> thee eastward וְנִסְתַּרְתָּ֙ <S%H5641><s%> and hide בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> thyself by the brook כְּרִ֔ית <S%H3747><s%> Cherith אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become מֵהַנַּ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the brook תִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> And it shall be [that] thou shalt drink וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹרְבִ֣ים <S%H6158><s%> the ravens צִוִּ֔יתִי <S%H6680><s%> and I have commanded לְכַלְכֶּלְךָ֖ <S%H3557><s%> to feed שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according unto the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> by the brook כְּרִ֔ית <S%H3747><s%> Cherith אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

וְהָעֹרְבִ֗ים <S%H6158><s%> And the ravens מְבִיאִ֨ים <S%H935><s%> brought ל֜וֹ לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> him bread וּבָשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> and flesh בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְלֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and bread וּבָשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> and flesh בָּעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> in the evening וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַנַּ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the brook יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> and he drank

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> happened מִקֵּ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass after יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> a while וַיִּיבַ֣שׁ <S%H3001><s%> dried up הַנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> that the brook כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> happened גֶ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> because there had been no rain בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto him saying

ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go צָרְפַ֙תָה֙ <S%H6886><s%> thee to Zarephath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לְצִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> which [belongeth] to Zidon וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <S%H3427><s%> and dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold צִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6680><s%> there behold I have commanded שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman אַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> a widow לְכַלְכְּלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3557><s%> there to sustain

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> So he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went צָרְפַ֗תָה <S%H6886><s%> to Zarephath וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And when he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> to the gate הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְהִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> was there אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman אַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> behold the widow מְקֹשֶׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H7197><s%> [was] there gathering עֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> of sticks וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to her and said קְחִי־ <S%H3947><s%> Fetch נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֧י מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> me I pray thee a little מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> water בַּכְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> in a vessel וְאֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> that I may drink

וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> was going לָקַ֑חַת <S%H3947><s%> to fetch וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> [it] he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to her and said לִֽקְחִי־ <S%H3947><s%> Bring נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֛י פַּת־ <S%H6595><s%> me I pray thee a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread בְּיָדֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> no יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> I have לִ֣י מָע֔וֹג <S%H4580><s%> not a cake כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> no מְלֹ֤א <S%H4393><s%> all along כַף־ <S%H3709><s%> branch קֶ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> of meal בַּכַּ֔ד <S%H3537><s%> in a barrel וּמְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> and a little שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil בַּצַּפָּ֑חַת <S%H6835><s%> in a cruse וְהִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מְקֹשֶׁ֜שֶׁת <S%H7197><s%> and behold I [am] gathering שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> two עֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> sticks וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> that I may go in וַעֲשִׂיתִ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> and dress לִ֣י וְלִבְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> it for me and my son וַאֲכַלְנֻ֖הוּ <S%H398><s%> that we may eat וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> it and die

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֶ֤יהָ <S%H413><s%> then אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> unto her Fear בֹּ֖אִי <S%H935><s%> not go עֲשִׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> [and] do כִדְבָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H1697><s%> as thou hast said אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> but עֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> but make לִ֣י מִ֠שָּׁם <S%H8033><s%> me thereof עֻגָ֨ה <S%H5692><s%> cake קְטַנָּ֤ה <S%H6996><s%> a little בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> first וְהוֹצֵ֣אתְ <S%H3318><s%> and bring לִ֔י וְלָ֣ךְ וְלִבְנֵ֔ךְ <S%H1121><s%> for thee and for thy son תַּעֲשִׂ֖י <S%H6213><s%> make בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> [it] unto me and after ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹה֩ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּ֤ד <S%H3537><s%> The barrel הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> of meal לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִכְלָ֔ה <S%H3615><s%> shall not waste וְצַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> neither shall the cruse הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֶחְסָ֑ר <S%H2637><s%> fail עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> until י֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until the day [תִּתֶּן־ כ] (תֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> sends יְהוָ֛ה <S%H5414><s%> sendeth ק) גֶּ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> the earth

וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the saying אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> of Elijah וַתֹּ֧אכַל <S%H398><s%> did eat [הוּא־ והיא כ] (הִֽיא־ <S%H1931><s%> he וָה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ק) וּבֵיתָ֖הּ <S%H1004><s%> and she and he and her house יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> [many] days

כַּ֤ד <S%H3537><s%> [And] the barrel הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> of meal לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor כָלָ֔תָה <S%H3615><s%> wasted וְצַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> not neither did the cruse הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor חָסֵ֑ר <S%H2638><s%> fail כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> by אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Elijah פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these חָלָ֕ה <S%H2470><s%> fell sick בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> [that] the son הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> of the woman בַּעֲלַ֣ת <S%H1172><s%> the mistress הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> came חָלְיוֹ֙ <S%H2483><s%> and his sickness חָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> sore מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> was so עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no נֽוֹתְרָה־ <S%H3498><s%> left בּ֖וֹ נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <S%H5397><s%> that there was no breath

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> unto Elijah מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לִּ֥י וָלָ֖ךְ אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> What have I to do with thee O thou man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> angels בָּ֧אתָ <S%H935><s%> abide אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> to me לְהַזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> to remembrance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹנִ֖י <S%H5771><s%> my sin וּלְהָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> and to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> my son

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her תְּנִֽי־ <S%H5414><s%> unto her Give לִ֣י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֑ךְ <S%H1121><s%> me thy son וַיִּקָּחֵ֣הוּ <S%H3947><s%> And he took מֵחֵיקָ֗הּ <S%H2436><s%> him out of her bosom וַֽיַּעֲלֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> and carried him up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֲלִיָּ֗ה <S%H5944><s%> into a loft אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> where he abode שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וַיַּשְׁכִּבֵ֖הוּ <S%H7901><s%> and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> his own מִטָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4296><s%> him upon his own bed

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> And he cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהָ֔י <S%H430><s%> my God הֲ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> also עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הָאַלְמָנָ֞ה <S%H490><s%> upon the widow אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I am מִתְגּוֹרֵ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> with whom I sojourn עִמָּ֛הּ <S%H5973><s%> with הֲרֵע֖וֹתָ <S%H7489><s%> hast thou also brought evil לְהָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> by slaying אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1121><s%> her son
